A correct knowledge of the Scripture would make men fear and tremble for their future, for every work will be brought into review before God, and they will receive their punishment according as their works have been. God will give to the faithful and true, patience under trial.--Letter 80a, 1895, pp. 3, 4, 8-10. (To J. E. White and wife, August 16, 1895.)
